caption: HTTP Response
description: The HTTP Response object contains detailed information about the response sent from a web server to the requester. It encompasses attributes and metadata that describe the response status, headers, body content, and other relevant information.
name: http_response

body_length.caption: Response Body Length
body_length.description: The actual length of the HTTP response body, in number of bytes, independent of a potentially existing Content-Length header.

code.description: The Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) status code returned from the web server to the client. For example, 200.

length.caption: Response Length
length.description: The length of the entire HTTP response, in number of bytes.

status.description: The response status. For example: A successful HTTP status of 'OK' which corresponds to a code of 200.
